H0.text: who sang heard it thru the grapevine first. Marvin Gaye

H1.text: who sang heard it thru the grapevine first. Gladys Knight & the Pips

H2.text: who sang heard it thru the grapevine first. The Temptations

H3.text: who sang heard it thru the grapevine first. the Miracles

A4.text: The first recording of the song to be released was produced by Whitfield for Gladys Knight & the Pips and released as a single in September 1967.

A5.text: The Marvin Gaye version was the second to be recorded in the beginning of 1967 but the third to be released.
